explanation: The report is correct. In send_iov_nontls the value parameter push_data is assigned to (e.g. push_data = false; both in the _MHD_IOV_MAX branch and the _WIN64 UINT32_MAX truncation), which modifies the function parameter variable. MISRA C 2023 Rule 17.8 forbids modifying function parameters (the object referred to by a pointer may be modified, but the parameter variable itself shall not be). Therefore this code violates Rule 17.8. A compliant fix would be to copy the parameter into a local (non-parameter) variable and modify that instead.
